channel.title: node on Daishi Kato's blog
channel.description: Recent content in node on Daishi Kato's blog

item.title: My first WebAssembly trial with Node.js only
item.description: Introduction One of the technologies we should keep eyes on in the web world is WebAssembly or wasm. As I am new to it, I won’t describe much of its fundamentals. Please visit the official web site to learn from scratch. https://webassembly.org/ This short article describes my first trial on wasm. What I want to try is just to run example code, but I’d start with writing the example code in wasm(wat).
